pic.alt: Power switch location

subsections.description: To unlock the Hatchery and PaP, you must collect 3 parts by spending Code Cylinders.

step.title: 1. Get the parts from 3 Groph Pods
step.description: When zombies drop Code Cylinders, you can use them on the 3 machines to call in Groph Pods. The blue Code Cylinder is used for Dragon Command, red is for Tank Factory, and yellow is for Supply Depot. Defend the pod until it opens up, revealing a part.

pic.alt: A Code Cylinder power-up
Groph Pod station in Dragon Command
Groph Pod station in Tank Factory
Groph Pod station in Supply Depot
A Groph Pod under attack
One of the parts inside the Groph Pod

step.title: 2. Place the parts and ride the dragon
step.description: Interact on the device to place all 3 parts. This will enable all 3 dragon stations. Each of the stations will take you to the Hatchery.

pic.alt: The device with all 3 parts placed
Dragon station 1 - at Dragon Command
Dragon station 2 - at Tank Factory
Dragon station 3 - at Supply Depot
PaP machine
Sewer to exit the Hatchery back to Belinski Square

subsections.description: Throughout the game, the dragon will breath fire on a random location of the map. Your screen will glow orange before the fire starts. Hold the shield or leave the area to prevent fire damage.

pic.alt: Screen glowing before the fire starts

subsections.description: Each player has a headstone with 4 trials in Belinski Square. Hover over a trial to view the requirements and interact to get the reward. Each player will see a green flame above their trials.

pic.alt: Trials with green flame above
Quick Revive - in Belinski Square
Juggernog - in Department Store
Mule Kick - in Operations Bunker
Stamin-Up - upstairs in the Infirmary
Speed Cola - upstairs at Supply Depot
Double Tap Root Beer - in Tank Factory
Wunderfizz location 1 - in the Department Store
Wunderfizz location 2 - bottom floor of the Armory
Wunderfizz location 3 - top floor of Dragon Command

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located in the Infirmary (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - bottom floor of the Infirmary, on the floor
Location 2 - middle floor of the Infirmary, on a bunk bed
Location 3 - top floor of the Infirmary, on a wall

subsections.description: Located near the Department Store or Operations Bunker (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - next to Juggernog, on a chair
Location 2 - outside of the Operations Bunker, on the door of a truck
Location 3 - in the Operations Bunker, on a shelf

subsections.description: Located in the Armory (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - bottom floor of the Armory, on a wall
Location 2 - at the Mystery Box floor of the Armory, on a wall
Location 3 - top floor of the Armory, on a box

subsections.description: Build at the workbench in the Operations Bunker

pic.alt: Workbench location

sections.description: Special equipment that can be used to call in an airstrike from a dragon.

subsections.description: All players must interact on the machine to start the lockdown. Survive 4 waves to finish the lockdown and get the Dragon Strike. A single Max Ammo power-up will spawn for use at any time during the lockdown.

pic.alt: Machine to interact
Max Ammo spawned by PaP machine
Dragon Strike location

sections.description: Complete the bottom trial to unlock the weapon for all players. The trial is the same every game.

subsections.description: Go to the Hatchery and shoot the egg above the sewer exit. Interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: Location to shoot the egg
Location to pick up the egg

subsections.header: 2. Bathe the Dragon Egg in Fire
subsections.description: Place the egg on one of the nests around the map. After the dragon breathes fire on that part of the map, the egg must cool, and then it can be picked up.

pic.alt: One of the nests, outside of Dragon Command

subsections.description: Wait for the dragon to breathe fire on the map, and lure zombies into the fire. Kill enough flaming zombies until the challenges advances.
Kill multiple zombies with a single bullet and repeat several times. Many guns can do this during Instakill, but snipers can do this normally.
Any melee weapon will count, including the shield bash.
Go back to the Hatchery and place the egg inside the incubator. Survive a lockdown in the basement, then wait a few rounds for the egg to cool. When the egg is cooled, pick it up.

pic.alt: Egg in the incubator

subsections.description: All players may claim the bottom trial reward to get the special weapon.

pic.alt: Special weapon reward from the trial headstone

subsections.description: After turning on power, the red light on Sophia will turn green. Interact with the green light so it turns red again.

pic.alt: The light after interacting

step.title: Power the generator
step.description: Destroy a Valkyrie Drone near the generator in the basement of the Hatchery. The generator will glow orange for a few minutes after doing this. Repeat this step if the generator turns off before collecting the cylinder item.

pic.alt: Generator without power
Generator with power

step.title: Configure the valves
step.description: Locate the valve with the pink cylinder and the valve with the green light. Then, interact with 5 of the valves to set the correct number based on the tool below. The valve with the pink cylinder does not have to be set to anything.

pic.alt: Valve with pink cylinder (stuck inside pipe)
Green light valve
Dragon Command Valve - upstairs and to the right
Tank Factory Valve - bottom floor
Infirmary Valve - main floor by a bed
Armory Valve - top floor
Supply Depot Valve - bottom floor under the stairs
Department Store Valve - top floor, left from the stairs

step.title: Pick up the cylinder
step.description: Go back to the valve with the pink cylinder and interact on it.

pic.alt: Cylinder able to be picked up

step.title: Return pink cylinder
step.description: Give the cylinder from the previous step to Sophia

pic.alt: Location to place cylinder

step.title: Select KRONOS
step.description: Use a bullet gun to shoot the letters until they spell KRONOS

pic.alt: KRONOS inputted on the dials

step.title: Press the light
step.description: Interact with the green light to input the password. When done correctly, the light will turn red.

pic.alt: The red light

subsections.description: There are 6 trophies around the map that must be moved with different weapons, then interacted to be picked up. They can be collected at any time during the game and in any order.

step.title: Gersh Trophy
step.description: Located in front of Dragon Command, must be shot with any gun.

pic.alt: Trophy built into a wall
Trophy fallen onto some rubble

step.title: Valkyrie Trophy
step.description: Located in Tank Factory, must be shot from a window using the shield blast.

pic.alt: Where to shoot the window with the shield blast
Trophy on the floor in front of the window

step.title: Mangler Trophy
step.description: Located in Supply Depot, under a grate that must be melted by the trap.

pic.alt: One of the trap buys
Trophy under the destroyed grate

step.title: 935 Trophy
step.description: Located in the Hatchery, only visible after shooting a red light in the sewer. The light will turn green when shot.

pic.alt: Red light in the sewer
Trophy in the toilet

step.title: Nuke Trophy
step.description: Located outside Supply Depot, must be blown out of the ground using the Dragon Strike.

pic.alt: Where to aim the Dragon Strike
Trophy raised from the ground

step.title: Groph Pod Trophy
step.description: Located in Operations Bunker, inside a safe that must be smashed open with the punch attack from the Guantlet of Siegfried after launching the whelp.

pic.alt: The safe to smash open
Trophy in the safe

subsections.description: Each of the 6 trophies have unique challenge you must complete. The order is randomized, and you have to move to a new round any time you fail. The bomb challenge has potential to end the game, so be prepared.

step.title: Start a challenge
step.description: Interact on the large screen to place the 6 trophies from before. Then, interact again to select a random challenge. If you fail, you must start a new round before you can interact again. If you succeed, you can immediately interact again to start the next challenge. All 6 challenges must be beaten before you can move on.

pic.alt: Location to place the trophies and select a random challenge

step.title: Bomb Challenge
step.description: Failing this step will instantly down all players located nearby any of the bombs. Belinski Square and the Hatchery are completely safe. Upon selecting the challenge, the screen will quickly flash through the 6 bomb locations on the map. Then, it will flash through the 6 locations slower, and this time you must remember the order. Then, there is a short timer before the bombs explode where you must interact with the 6 bombs in the correct order. If you run out of time or interact with a bomb out of order, they will all explode.

pic.alt: Bomb challenge selected and the screen highlighting a location
Dragon Command bomb, upstairs and to the left
Tank Factory bomb, top floor and in the room on the left
Infirmary bomb, on a pillar when going to the bottom level
Armory bomb, on the wall on the bottom level
Supply Depot bomb, straight through the door on a wall
Dept. Store bomb, under the staircase on the bottom floor

step.title: Groph Pod Challenge
step.description: A Groph Pod will fall outside of the map at one of the dragon ride locations. Defend it from zombies until it opens, then launch a whelp down to retrieve the part. Pick up the part and return it to Sophia.

pic.alt: Groph Pod outside Supply Depot
Opened Groph Pod with a whelp flying towards it
Part dropped off by whelp
Location to place part

step.title: Gersh Challenge
step.description: Shoot Gersh until 3 quotes play and he flies to Sophia. He appears as a glowing yellow orb and leaves a trail behind as he moves. He will randomly move around the map until he's been shot enough to play all 3 quotes, and you can follow the high pitched sound to find him.

pic.alt: Glowing yellow orb (Gersh)
Gersh at Dragon Command after all 3 quotes

step.title: Mangler Escort Challenge
step.description: Escort the green-eyed Mangler to Dragon Command. It can spawn in several locations, including Tank Factory. If it loses line of sight with a player, it will sprint away. Stay close and be careful not to kill it.

pic.alt: Green-eyed Mangler at Tank Factory
Location to bring Mangler

step.title: Valkyrie Escort Challenge
step.description: Escort the damaged Valkyrie drone to Dragon Command. It always spawns in Belinski Square. Unlike the Mangler, it will not move unless you are standing right next to it, but you must still be careful not to kill it. Make sure you have the upper Department Store doors open, otherwise it will freeze its path.

pic.alt: Damaged Valkyrie in Belinski Square
Damaged Valkyrie in Dragon Command

step.title: Lockdown Challenge
step.description: This challenge will always appear last. Take the part from the challenge area and bring it to the Hatchery. All players must interact with the machine to start a Mangler-only lockdown. After suriving all the waves, go back to the machine, pick up the part, and bring it back to Sophia.

pic.alt: Part to pick up
Machine to start lockdown and get part
Location to place part

subsections.header: 6. Bring the Power Core to Nikolai

step.title: Grab the power core from Sophia

pic.alt: Power core in an open compartment

step.title: At Belinski Square, give the part to Nikolai
step.description: Stand near the wall facing Nikolai and launch a whelp. It will carry the part to Nikolai, and a quote will play.

pic.alt: Whelp flying to Nikolai with the power core

subsections.description: You cannot leave the boss fight until it's done. Make sure you have perks, a full shield, strong weapons, and any gobblegum you want to bring.

step.title: Enter the arena
step.description: All players must stand on the grate under Sophia, and a sewer will take you to the arena.

pic.alt: The sewer grate

step.title: Press the button
step.description: Go to the middle of the arena and press the button to release Nikolai.

pic.alt: The button

step.title: Shoot the glowing parts of the dragon
step.description: Hitmarkers will show when you're doing damage. Different areas of the dragon will start glowing red after being shot by Nikolai. Repeat until the dragon is dead. Throughout the fight, large sections of the arena will start on fire. To avoid damage, go to one of the trenches or hold your shield.

pic.alt: A glowing spot on the dragon
Dragon breathing fire

step.title: Defeat Nikolai
step.description: There are 4 yellow sections on Nikolai's mech suit that must be destroyed. Two yellow lights on top must be destroyed first, and will only be available to shoot at certain times. After that, you can destroy the two yellow lights on the front of the mech suit. During the fight, you will have to defend against R.A.P.S. in addition to the other enemies. Once the fight is done, all players will teleport back to Belinski Square, get the achievement, and can continue playing normally. Now that the dragon is dead, it will no longer light parts of the map on fire.

pic.alt: First glowing yellow target on top of the mech's head
Second glowing yellow target on the other side of the mech's head
One of the front yellow lights destroyed and the other still lit up
R.A.P.S.

subsections.description: Interact with 3 vodka bottles

pic.alt: Location 1 - through the front door of the Department Store, on a couch
Location 2 - just outside of the Operations Bunker, on the ground by two bodies
Location 3 - straight through the door to the Supply Depot, on a bookshelf

subsections.description: Interact with 3 ace of spades playing cards

pic.alt: Location 1 - upstairs in Dragon Command, on a desk
Location 2 - middle level of Tank Factory, on a blackboard
Location 3 - in the room to the right of PaP, sticking out of a book

subsections.description: There are 2 hats and 1 pair of wings that can be unlocked. Each player can equip only one at a time, and each one gives different abilities.

step.title: Dragon Wings
step.description: Unlocks instant teleport to Hatchery, adds 30% explosive damage resistance, and adds 30% fire damage resistance. Unlock by riding the dragon at all 3 stations and having the Dragon Strike and Gauntlet of Siegfried. Equip by interacting with a mannequin.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Dragon Wings, top floor of Department Store
Dragon Command teleport location
Tank Factory teleport location
Supply Depot teleport location

step.title: Mangler Helmet
step.description: Adds 30% damage increase to manglers and adds 50% damage reduction from manglers. Unlock by shooting off 5 mangler arm cannons and 5 mangler helmets. Equip by interacting with a mannequin.

pic.alt: Mangler with arm shot off
Mangler with helmet shot off
Mannequin with Mangler Helmet, middle floor of Department Store

step.title: Valkyrie Drone Hat
step.description: Adds 30% damage increase to valkyrie drones and adds 50% electric damage resistance. Unlock by shooting off all 3 arms from 5 valkyrie drones and 5 cameras from valkyrie drones. Equip by interacting with a mannequin.

pic.alt: Valkyrie with 2 of its 3 arms shot off
Valkyrie with camera shot off
Mannequin with Valkyrie Drone Hat, middle floor of Department Store

step.title: 1. Get 50 shield kills
step.description: Melee attacks and shield blasts both count

step.title: 2. Stand in the fire
step.description: Hold the shield inside dragon fire for the entire duration of the flames. This must be done twice.

pic.alt: Using the shield to stand in fire

step.title: 3. Shoot 3 symbols
step.description: Using the shield blast, shoot 3 purple symbols across the map

pic.alt: Location 1 - at Dragon Command, looking left from the dragon station
Location 2 - at Tank Factory, looking right from the dragon station
Location 3 - at Supply Depot, looking up towards the dragon station when standing by Speed Cola

step.title: 4. Give to the dragon corpse
step.description: Hold the shield and interact on the dragon corpse by the trials in Belinski Square. The old shield will go in and the new one will be given to you. All players will get the upgrade.

pic.alt: The shield inside the dragon corpse

step.title: 2. Use the Dragon Strike on a flag
step.description: There will be 1 flag outside the map for each player. Use the dragon strike on it to destroy the flag.

pic.alt: Flag outside Dragon Command, straight back from the dragon station
Flag outside Tank Factory, seen from the window by Double Tap
Flag outside Supply Depot, looking left from the dragon station
Flag outside Belinski Square, seen behind the sewer exit by Quick Revive

step.title: 3. Lockdown
step.description: Go to the Hatchery and start another lockdown. During the lockdown, use the Dragon Strike as much as possible. It will recharge much faster than normal during the lockdown. If successful, all players can pick up the Draconite Controller.

pic.alt: Location to start the lockdown
Using a Dragon Strike at the lockdown
Draconite Controller

step.title: 1. Get the flask from Monkey Bomb kills
step.description: After 50 Monkey Bomb kills, a zombie will drop a flask. Interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: The flask

step.title: 2. Pick up the flowers
step.description: Interact with the flowers on the desk in the upstairs of Dragon Command.

pic.alt: The flowers

step.title: 3. Get the lit candle
step.description: Use the shield blast to light a candle, then pick it up.

pic.alt: One of the candle locations, in Supply Depot

step.title: 4. Aquire upgraded Monkey Bomb
step.description: Throw a Monkey Bomb on your trial headstone, then interact just below the green flame on the prompt. Pick up the Dubstep Monkey Bomb from the skeleton arm.

pic.alt: Monkey Bomb on the grave
Interaction prompt
Upgraded Monkey Bomb trial reward

subsections.description: Complete rounds under a certain time to unlock melee weapons. Purchase in the Operations Bunker.

pic.alt: Wrench - 5 rounds under 5 minutes
Malice - 10 rounds under 13 minutes
Slash N' Burn - 15 rounds under 24 minutes
Fury's Song - 20 rounds under 32 minutes

subsections.description: While fighting Nikolai, 3 speakers will appear that play the Soviet anthem. Shooting all 3 speakers before the song ends will turn on Ace of Spades.

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the left side
Location 2 - on the right side
Location 3 - straight back

sections.description: Play Samantha's Sorrow and get a Max Ammo

subsections.description: Throw 3 Monkey Bombs into 3 different dragon fire locations. You will hear the Monkey Bomb screaming each time.

pic.alt: Burning Monkey Bomb

subsections.description: Interact with a Samantha doll in Belinski Square. A particle effect will show the game has started. Then, find and shoot 5 Samantha dolls around the map. They will play a song when you get close, and only 1 will be in the map at a time. If you run out of time, Samantha will laugh, and you have to start the game again at the original doll.

pic.alt: The doll to start hide and seek
Location 1 - at Belinski Square, on top of a telephone pole
Location 2 - in Department Store, hanging below the broken staircase
Location 3 - in the Operations Bunker, through a barrier by Mule Kick
Location 4 - outside of Dragon Command, on the end of the tank barrel
Location 5 - outside of Dragon Command, hanging below a balcony
Location 6 - in Dragon Command, upstairs on a broken pillar
Location 7 - outside of Tank Factory, in a sewer pipe
Location 8 - at Tank Factory, looking right from the dragon station
Location 9 - in the Infirmary, above the destroyed floor ramp
Location 10 - top floor of Infirmary, on a cart
Location 11 - between the Armory and Supply Depot, outside a barrier on the train car
Location 12 - outside of Supply Depot, hanging from a light
Location 13 - in Supply Depot, on a box upstairs
Location 14 - at Supply Depot, looking left from the dragon station

subsections.description: Go back to the original doll and interact again. This time, you'll get a Max Ammo and the song will play.

pic.alt: The doll to get the Max Ammo and song
